issue.title: [Doc] pyarrow.Array.diff Examples is wrongly rendered
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17660](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17660). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.Array.html#pyarrow.Array.diff>

The output of the diff function is rendered outside of the code block
